Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.builders
Deprecated: ShowHide
View: ClientSubclassPackageImplementation

Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.builders

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAssetParams
    An interface used to pass asset parameters across the process boundary during asset creation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssetParams
    A base class for the resulting Params objects which are generated by the AssetBuilders.
    FileAssetBuilder
    An asset builder for monolithic file assets.
    FileAssetBuilder.FileAssetParams
     
    HLSAssetBuilder
    The HLSAssetBuilder is used to build the parameters for an HLS asset download.
    HLSAssetBuilder.HLSAssetParams
    This class contains the parameters to configure an HLS asset for download.
    HSSAssetBuilder
    Moved out of client visible package as the feature has been removed, because this class has many dependencies and removing the class entirely will be difficult until the remainder of the HSS is removed.
    HSSAssetBuilder.HSSAssetParams
    This class contains the parameters to configure an HSS asset for download.
    MPDAssetBuilder
    The MPDAssetBuilder is used to build the parameters for an HLS asset download.
    MPDAssetBuilder.MPDAssetParams
    This class contains the parameters to configure an MPD asset for download.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FileAssetBuilder.FileAssetParamsException
     
    HLSAssetBuilder.HLSAssetParamsException
    An exception which is thrown on failed validation of fields during building of the asset params from the HLSAssetBuilder.
    HSSAssetBuilder.HSSAssetParamsException
    An exception which is thrown on failed validation of fields during building of the asset params from the HSSAssetBuilder.
    MPDAssetBuilder.MPDAssetParamsException
    An exception which is thrown on failed validation of fields during building of the asset params from the MPDAssetBuilder.
